autumn.lang.compiler.errors

Interface IErrorReporter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicErrorReporter, CoupledErrorReporter

    public interface IErrorReporter
    An instance of this interface is used to report compile-time errors to the user/programmer.

    Specification Note: Error codes are assigned randomly using a random number generator. This avoids the appearance of relationships between similarly numbered errors.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int errorCount()
      This method returns the number of errors that were thus far reported by this reporter.
      void reportFailedCheck(ErrorReport report)
      This method reports that a static-check failed.
      void reportSyntaxError(java.net.URL file, int line, int column)
      This method reports that the parsing of a module failed.

    • Method Detail

      • reportSyntaxError

        void reportSyntaxError(java.net.URL file,
                     int line,
                     int column)
        This method reports that the parsing of a module failed.
        Parameters:
        file - is the path to the module's file, as supplied to the compiler.
        line - is an estimate of where parsing failed within the input.
        column - is an estimate of where parsing failed within the input.

      • reportFailedCheck

        void reportFailedCheck(ErrorReport report)
        This method reports that a static-check failed.
        Parameters:
        report - is a an error-report that describes what went wrong.

      • errorCount

        int errorCount()
        This method returns the number of errors that were thus far reported by this reporter.
        Returns:
        the number of reported errors.
